snippet: The deal is expected to allow the technology providers to offer a broad range of software solutions for the automotive industry.
abstract: DealBook Online; Cox Automotive announces $4 billion purchase of Dealertrack Technologies; Cox president Sandy Schwartz suggests deal will be good for both company and automobile industry.
lead_paragraph: The deal is expected to allow the technology providers to offer a broad range of software solutions for the automotive industry.

headline.main: Owner of Kelley Blue Book and Autotrader to Buy Dealertrack for $4 Billion
